parameters.content:
üî• GROUP 1: CUSTOMER INTAKE
Nodes: Webhook_Customer_Input
Purpose: Receives customer questions via webhook API endpoint
Function:

Accepts POST requests at /customer-support endpoint
Validates incoming JSON payload with customer questions
Triggers the entire support workflow

üìö GROUP 2: KNOWLEDGE BASE RETRIEVAL
Nodes: Sheets_Fetch_Knowledge_Base, Handle_Sheets_Error
Purpose: Fetches all knowledge base articles from Google Sheets with error handling
Function:

Connects to Google Sheets containing support articles
Implements fallback mode when Sheets API fails
Ensures workflow continues even with KB unavailability

üîç GROUP 3: CONTENT FILTERING & MATCHING
Nodes: Filter_Relevant_Articles, Format_Filtered_Data
Purpose: Filters relevant KB articles based on customer question keywords
Function:

Analyzes customer question for keywords (password, billing, subscription, etc.)
Matches against knowledge base content
Structures data for AI processing
Handles fallback scenarios when no matches found

ü§ñ GROUP 4: AI RESPONSE GENERATION
Nodes: Build_LLM_Request, Send_To_OpenRouter, Handle_OpenRouter_Error, Code_Parse_LLM
Purpose: Prepares LLM request, sends to OpenRouter, and parses AI response
Function:

Constructs structured prompts with KB context
Sends requests to OpenRouter API with 15-second timeout
Implements comprehensive error handling for AI service failures
Parses JSON responses with fallback for parsing errors
Generates confidence scores and source citations

‚ö° GROUP 5: CONFIDENCE EVALUATION
Nodes: Evaluate_Response_Quality
Purpose: Evaluates answer quality and routes to appropriate response path
Function:

Checks multiple conditions (empty KB, low confidence, system errors)
Routes to escalation path when criteria met
Uses OR logic for comprehensive error detection

üö® GROUP 6: TEAM ESCALATION
Nodes: Notify_Support_Team, Log_Slack_Failure, Format_Escalated_Response
Purpose: Notifies support team of questions requiring manual assistance
Function:

Sends structured alerts to Slack channel
Handles Slack API failures gracefully
Formats professional escalation responses
Logs failures for operational monitoring

üì§ GROUP 7: CUSTOMER RESPONSE DELIVERY
Nodes: Format_Customer_Response, Deliver_Response
Purpose: Formats and delivers final response back to customer
Function:

Structures responses with answer, confidence, sources
Handles both successful and escalated responses
Returns proper HTTP responses with JSON payload
Ensures consistent response format
